Direct","Customer - Channel","Channel Partner / Reseller","Installation Partner","Technology Partner","Other"],"measureName":"Type","measureScheme":[{"name":"Prospect","color":"violet"},{"name":"Customer - Direct","color":"purple"},{"name":"Customer - Channel","color":"blue"},{"name":"Channel Partner / Reseller","color":"green"},{"name":"Installation Partner","color":"yellow"},{"name":"Technology Partner","color":"orange"},{"name":"Other","color":"red"}]},{"api":"Industry","role":"picklist","display":true,"measureName":"Industry","measureScheme":[{"name":"Agriculture","color":"violet"},{"name":"Apparel","color":"purple"},{"name":"Banking","color":"blue"},{"name":"Biotechnology","color":"green"},{"name":"Chemicals","color":"yellow"},{"name":"Communications","color":"orange"},{"name":"Construction","color":"red"},{"name":"default","color":"black"}]},{"api":"name","role":"name","display":true},{"api":"id","role":"id","display":true},{"api":"parentId","role":"parentId","display":false}],"objectType":"Account"}],"initialLevelsToRetrieve":2,"chartType":"Hierarchy"},"primaryNodeInitialization":"None"},"panels":{"ControlPanel":{"showBanner":false,"buttonParameters":{"showtestbuttons":true,"levels":5,"levelsIncreaseOnly":true,"autoIncreaseLevels":true}},"InfoPanel":{"showOnTop":true,"allowPopover":true,"objectIcons":{"Account":"standard:account","Opportunity":"standard:opportunity"}},"ChartPanel":{"Title":"","showLevelsInitial":1,"Hierarchy":{"showZoomSlider":true,"clearHighlightedPaths":true},"Selectors":{"node":{"selector":".node","appendType":"g","styleclassText":"chartText","styleclassTextShadow":"chartTextShadow"}}}},"search":{"searchAction":"HighlightOpenPath","configuredAllowSearch":true}}
